review: Good natured Doctor, takes time and explains everything in detail,  Dr. Ashwini is a good professional *** ************** and gives us best suggestions multiple choices on treatment, I would recommend Dr. Ashwini Narayana Swamy (DentaCode).

review: I went for my mother's root canal, which suggested knee replacement surgery. The doctor examined well and determined that a root canal was not necessary; instead, we opted for a filling. I believe the doctor recommends what is truly needed. The hospital is clean, and the staff are supportive, smiling, and happy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent and empathetic doctor understood my dad's concerns as an elderly person in his late 70s was very conscientious about the pricing and recommended only the required procedures with all pros and cons explained in detail. Well equipped clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for cavity fillings and tooth implant. Doctor listen to us with good patience and will explain the dental issues we have in detail. If patient do not know English, she will speak in kannada also. Totally a good experience and I recommend this doctor.

review: Dr Ashwini was patient, friendly and very informative. While treating me she was gentle and clear with her instructions...thanks to her constant doze of encouragement to ensure the results were 100% and morePost the scalling process, she shared best practices which would be suitable to my present state of my teeth and gums. She also went above and beyond to  demonstrate and explain how I should try to address residuals around the neck of my teeth. Thanks Doc.

Dr Ashwini was very professional and friendly made us feel like family.

Always have a great, smooth experience here and would highly recommend.
